name: GolfStream
description:
Platform game developped with Anthony Cardinale training on Udemy, link of the training (in french) on Udemy : https://www.udemy.com/course/formation-unity-3d-creez-des-jeux-3d-avec-unity-et-csharp/)

PC Controls, Move the mouse to aim the ball pour viser et clic droit pour tirer (la barre de force s'affiche à gauche de l'écran). Hold down the right mouse click to charge the shot, then release it to shoot the ball. Left clic in the goal to cancel the shot

There are 10 levels, have fun !
